author: Dave Hauck
comment: It looks great. I paid the money for Prime, but the Fit sync never syncs and the companion app crashes. I emailed tech support, but haven't heard back yet. I'll update the review if the developer responds and resolves it. Update: the developer responded and said they couldn't fix it and refunded my money. It's a shame because it's a really nice looking watch face.

author: warren smit
comment: I payed for the app on my S4 it uses to crash slot and not sync... I thought that as the phone was old and had plenty on it is ok. I now have the S7 and it crashes all the time and still does not sync. Why.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Please reinstall it and accept location permition
You didn't accepted it..

Here is log:
Client must have ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION or ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION permission to perform any location operations.

author: Jeroen Engelander
comment: Bought it for the beauty and Google fit integration. It's a beautiful watchface but Google fit does not work. Premium is a scam, tried rebooting the watch and phone, also resync of apps. But alas!

author: Brad Stuart
comment: Very pleasing to look at with good functionality at the same time. Some additions I'd like to see are a brightness slider, ##latest heart rate (based on your time interval settings)## now removed, step counter. The "OK Google" middle touch feature doesn't work for me  Why remove the heart rate monitor interval? That was one of the best features!

author: long Lam
comment: I love the face design, so I purchased the premier version which unlocks some extra icon on the watch face, these icons link with Google Fit in the setting up app, but when I touch step icon or heart rate icon on the watch face, it never sync with Google Fit's data. Always said: no data.

author: Danijel Šaban
comment: I really like this one. Only thing I'm missing is the steps counter somewhere on the main screen (for example, somewhere under time). Thanks.

author: M Myers
comment: The weather will no longer update and you can't force it to update through the phone app.  Got contacted by the dev if I had tried the other weather providers. Yes I have with no fix.  Really regretting paying for it.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Have you tried other weather provider? Update: send us an order number for refund.

author: J Mar
comment: Fit Not Functional. Another waste of $1.49. Should have read the reviews before I purchased and wasted 30 min trying to make it work as described.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi,  please, send email and we will be happy to help you, but if you don't like it, you can send us an email with order number and we will make refund for you.

author: Courtney Sylvia
comment: Two watch faces purchased and neither will show up in watch or android wear all after multiple syncs and reboots... Uninstalling both

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please install it from the wear store.

author: Luis Pelayo
comment: I like the look but it doesn't update phone battery or weather on regular basis. It updates when it wants. Probably going to un-install.

author: Nicolas Löwe
comment: Liked it a lot, but since last update no FIT data sync. Which was the killer feature I purchased it for.

author: richard escanuelas
comment: It sucks like your watches

author: Ramphis Boniche
comment: nice app

author: Robin Marshall
comment: Loved it, but since latest update it no longer updates the Google fit info, everything stays at zero. I have contacted the developer, who responded almost instantly to say reinstall, which obviously I had already tried, and then, nothing else, no response. Not that impressed I'm afraid, which is a shame because on all other aspects, it's a great design (used on a Nixon Mission).

author: Justice Clum
comment: Love all the apps from this developer. Especially this one.  My only complaint is how they implement the weather info system in their faces. It's very simplistic. It requires location to be on all the time to get the info and the location selection option doesn't work AT ALL. It doesn't detect what state is put in, just the city. There's more than on of my cities in the US.  I have a few other watch faces that use a method that doesn't require location to be on indefinitely to be able to get weather stats. It allows you to pick a location from a map and it refreshes every so often. You don't need to have location on.    It would be greatly appreciated if the developer could either overhaul the system these other faces use or at least fix the location selection option so it actually works.

author: Vishal Raghavan
comment: The design and features look good but there are glitches. Phone battery info doesn't get synced after the first time. Was unable to use any of the home screen button after first time. Had to reinstall it.

author: Elliot William
comment: Premium version is a scam. Attempting to link Google Fit will conveniently crash this app. Better watchfaces out there more deserving of your cash.

author: Ryan Felix
comment: Looks great but premium version doesn't work Yes, I paid for premium and I have it checked and Google fit is connected but nothing is there. Music player doesn't work either.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, what doesn't work for you? Have you enabled premium option?

author: Glyn Weston
comment: Premium is not stable.  Sometimes works other times not.  It's a shame because it look really nice.

author: Guy Soffer
comment: I paid for premium but Google fit doesn't work!

author: darksun b
comment: Weather never updates the weather! And no replies for the dev mails!

author: Zach Steffens
comment: Where's the date format options? DD MM YYYY

author: David Poss
comment: The timer shortcut doesn't seem to work

author: Adam Tafesse
comment: Love the look

author: Simon Johnson
comment: Started off OK, stopped responding to touches. Uninstalled and reinstalled, doesn't appear on list of watch faces, so impossible to use. £1 wasted.  Update: after another reinstall working again, so upped to 2 stars. Not a great user experience, although when it works it looks good.
title: No longer works

author: Anthony Nesperos
comment: Hello. Is there any way you can make the Date bigger in the next update? It's a little hard to see in broad day light. Thanks in advance.
title: Very good watch face

author: michelle brown
comment: I purchased what I thought was a nice face, it stopped working on me and is no longer in my list of faces. Highly upset. Rip off
title: :( waste

author: Sam Sharma
comment: Such a lousy app even the basic ones are not synchronizing properly and expect us to buy the premium ones. What a joke,pls take out app before it does more damages to other smart watches!!!!
title: Watch face

author: Michael Kane
comment: None of the touch menus are working on the watch face, I have the paid version and have re installed, but to no avail,finally got it to work after several restarts of both the phone and the watch.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Next time just check is premium enabled. Also check locker on watch face... Regards

title: Nice face but...

author: Matt Fischer
comment: Very nice watch face, I love the look! Would like to be able to disable seconds indicator and disable color changes, you can lock UI but you lose all interactivity. Well done!
title: Excellent Face

author: D'andrae gibson
comment: OK Google Now does not work, neither does Google Fit and the app player activates different music players
title: Pretty but not functional

author: Melissa Baatz
comment: It's a nice looking watch face. Would like to have integrated moto body tracker option as well as Google Fit.  Would also like to have the option to have just a step count and to be able to turn off some of the interactive features

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,
Do you checked is your watch connected to the device?
Try to reinstall the app?

title: Needs work

author: David Ley
comment: Would be 5 stars if distance could be displayed as miles not kilometers. Edit down to 3 stars. Notifications of "try this watch face" have started :(
title: Great looking watch.

author: Chris Syrakis
comment: Paid for it, no interaction,  power levels are not accurate

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

Please check is premium enabled. Also check is locker unlocked on watchface.

If you still have issues contact us on email for refund.

Regards

title: Disappointed

author: Gustavo E
comment: To much going on, colors are dreadful
title: Bad looking

author: Peter Lanneau
comment: It use to work on Wear 2.0 beta 1, and 2. Does not work with beta 3 and 7.1.1
title: Nice face.

author: Duane Rothers
comment: Very useful and has great info available
title: Really like it

author: Steven Tamotsu
comment: This is my go to watchface. It tells me exactly what I want and is very customizable

author: Jamesy Holt
comment: Now my main watch face, easy to read, watch and phone battery levels are useful and ambient mode is simple and clear. Great watch face!!
title: Great watch face

author: Joseph Ochtun
comment: One if the best watch faces I have seen but the date needs to be a little larger.
title: Love it
